statements: SELECT * FROM demand_forecast WHERE forecast_date = '2022-10-25';
SELECT partner_name, forecast_value FROM demand_forecast ORDER BY forecast_value DESC;
SELECT partner_id, partner_name FROM demand_forecast WHERE partner_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM demand_forecast ORDER BY partner_name ASC;
SELECT partner_id, forecast_value FROM demand_forecast WHERE forecast_value > 1000;
SELECT * FROM demand_forecast ORDER BY forecast_date DESC, forecast_value ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT partner_name, forecast_value FROM demand_forecast WHERE forecast_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT partner_id, partner_name, forecast_date FROM demand_forecast WHERE forecast_value > 100 ORDER BY forecast_value DESC
SELECT * FROM demand_forecast WHERE partner_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_forecasts FROM demand_forecast
SELECT * FROM demand_forecast_data;
SELECT * FROM demand_forecast_data WHERE partner_id = 'c71fdb42-5e70-4f94-b142-6c009a4e1df9';
SELECT forecast_date, demand_quantity FROM demand_forecast_data ORDER BY forecast_date DESC;
SELECT partner_id, SUM(demand_quantity) AS total_demand FROM demand_forecast_data GROUP BY partner_id;
SELECT id, forecast_date FROM demand_forecast_data WHERE demand_quantity > 100 ORDER BY forecast_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM demand_forecast_data WHERE demand_quantity > 100 ORDER BY forecast_date DESC;
SELECT id, partner_id, forecast_date FROM demand_forecast_data WHERE partner_id = '32b530be-2dd0-4b0a-b8a1-57d44ed6f54d';
SELECT partner_id, SUM(demand_quantity) AS total_demand FROM demand_forecast_data GROUP BY partner_id HAVING total_demand > 5000 ORDER BY total_demand DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_planning WHERE planning_date >= '2023-01-01' AND planned_quantity < 50 ORDER BY planning_date ASC, planned_quantity DESC;
SELECT partner_id, COUNT(*) AS planning_count FROM inventory_planning GROUP BY partner_id ORDER BY planning_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM partners;
SELECT partner_name, partner_location FROM partners;
SELECT forecast_date, forecast_qty FROM demand_forecast WHERE partner_id = 3;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT partner_name, partner_location FROM partners ORDER BY partner_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM partners WHERE partner_name='Company A';
SELECT partner_name, partner_location FROM partners WHERE partner_location='City';
SELECT partner_name, COUNT(partner_id) AS total_partners FROM partners GROUP BY partner_name;
SELECT p.partner_name, f.forecast_date, i.product_name, i.quantity FROM partners p JOIN demand_forecast f ON p.partner_id = f.partner_id JOIN inventory i ON p.partner_id = i.inventory_id;
SELECT AVG(forecast_qty) AS average_forecast FROM demand_forecast WHERE partner_id=1 AND forecast_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM partners LIMIT 10;
SELECT partner_name, partnership_start_date FROM partners WHERE partnership_start_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT partner_name, contact_person, contact_email FROM partners ORDER BY partner_name DESC;
SELECT partner_name, partnership_start_date FROM partners WHERE partner_name LIKE 'A%' AND partnership_start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT collaboration_id, partner_id, collaboration_start_date, collaboration_type FROM collaborations WHERE collaboration_type = 'Strategic';
SELECT partner_name, partnership_start_date FROM partners;
SELECT forecast_date, forecast_qty FROM demand_forecast WHERE partner_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT product_name, in_stock_qty FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT partner_name, contact_person, contact_email FROM partners WHERE partnership_start_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT collaboration_id, collaboration_start_date, collaboration_type FROM collaborations WHERE collaboration_type IN ('project', 'event') AND collaboration_start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM demand_forecast_data ORDER BY forecast_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, forecast_qty FROM demand_forecast_data WHERE partner_id = 3;
SELECT partner_name, contact_email, region FROM supply_chain_partners WHERE region = 'North America';
SELECT * FROM inventory_planning WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01';
SELECT approval_id, approval_status, approval_date FROM demand_forecast_approval ORDER BY approval_date;
SELECT * FROM demand_forecast_data WHERE forecast_qty > 100 ORDER BY forecast_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, forecast_qty FROM demand_forecast_data WHERE forecast_date = '2022-08-15';
SELECT partner_name, region FROM supply_chain_partners WHERE region = 'APAC' ORDER BY partner_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, quantity, last_updated FROM inventory_planning WHERE location_id = 101 ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT * FROM demand_forecast_approval WHERE approval_status = 'pending' ORDER BY approval_date ASC, forecast_id DESC;
